duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise one or more Sales Departments within the store, including merchandise presentation, inventory control, pricing, and sales enhancements.
Support a strong commitment to world-class customer service and ensure a pleasant shopping experience for all customers.
Meet or exceed all financial plans set by the company.
Execute all Sales plans as directed by the company.

Staff the Departments with service-oriented associates, participate in interviewing and selection, coordinate training, prepare/approve performance appraisals, recommend merit/promotional increases, prepare weekly work schedules, coach, and motivate associates.
Carry out Supervisory responsibilities in accordance with the company’s policies and applicable laws.
Provide a legendary experience for every customer by assisting customers in making buying decisions and promoting programs such as CLUB Membership, VOC, and In-Store Pick-up.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 3-5 years in Retail Management with responsibility for one or more Sales Departments.
